The word<S>1697</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> that came to Micah<S>4318</S> the Morasthite<S>4183</S> in the days<S>3117</S> of Jotham<S>3147</S>, Ahaz<S>271</S>, and Hezekiah<S>3169</S>, kings<S>4428</S> of Judah<S>3063</S>, which he saw<S>2372</S> concerning Samaria<S>8111</S> and Jerusalem<S>3389</S>.
Hear<S>8085</S>, all ye people<S>5971</S>; hearken<S>7181</S>, O earth<S>776</S>, and all that therein<S>4393</S> is: and let the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S> be witness<S>5707</S> against you, the Lord<S>136</S> from his holy<S>6944</S> temple<S>1964</S>. <sup>all ye: Heb. ye people, all of them</sup> <sup>all that: Heb. the fulness thereof</sup>
For, behold, the LORD<S>3068</S> cometh forth<S>3318</S> out of his place<S>4725</S>, and will come down<S>3381</S>, and tread<S>1869</S> upon the high places<S>1116</S> of the earth<S>776</S>.
And the mountains<S>2022</S> shall be molten<S>4549</S> under him, and the valleys<S>6010</S> shall be cleft<S>1234</S>, as wax<S>1749</S> before<S>6440</S> the fire<S>784</S>, and as the waters<S>4325</S> that are poured<S>5064</S> down a steep place<S>4174</S>. <sup>a steep: Heb. a descent</sup>
For the transgression<S>6588</S> of Jacob<S>3290</S> is all this, and for the sins<S>2403</S> of the house<S>1004</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>. What is the transgression<S>6588</S> of Jacob<S>3290</S>? is it not Samaria<S>8111</S>? and what are the high places<S>1116</S> of Judah<S>3063</S>? are they not Jerusalem<S>3389</S>?
Therefore I will make<S>7760</S> Samaria<S>8111</S> as an heap<S>5856</S> of the field<S>7704</S>, and as plantings<S>4302</S> of a vineyard<S>3754</S>: and I will pour down<S>5064</S> the stones<S>68</S> thereof into the valley<S>1516</S>, and I will discover<S>1540</S> the foundations<S>3247</S> thereof.
And all the graven images<S>6456</S> thereof shall be beaten to pieces<S>3807</S>, and all the hires<S>868</S> thereof shall be burned<S>8313</S> with the fire<S>784</S>, and all the idols<S>6091</S> thereof will I lay<S>7760</S> desolate<S>8077</S>: for she gathered<S>6908</S> it of the hire<S>868</S> of an harlot<S>2181</S>, and they shall return<S>7725</S> to the hire<S>868</S> of an harlot<S>2181</S>.
Therefore I will wail<S>5594</S> and howl<S>3213</S>, I will go<S>3212</S> stripped<S>7758</S> <S>7758</S> and naked<S>6174</S>: I will make<S>6213</S> a wailing<S>4553</S> like the dragons<S>8577</S>, and mourning<S>60</S> as the owls<S>1323</S> <S>3284</S>. <sup>owls: Heb. daughters of the owl</sup>
For her wound<S>4347</S> is incurable<S>605</S>; for it is come<S>935</S> unto Judah<S>3063</S>; he is come<S>5060</S> unto the gate<S>8179</S> of my people<S>5971</S>, even to Jerusalem<S>3389</S>. <sup>her: or, she is grievously sick of her wounds</sup>
Declare<S>5046</S> ye it not at Gath<S>1661</S>, weep<S>1058</S> ye not at all<S>1058</S>: in the house of Aphrah<S>1036</S> roll<S>6428</S> <S>6428</S> thyself in the dust<S>6083</S>. <sup>Aphrah: that is, Dust</sup>
Pass ye away<S>5674</S>, thou inhabitant<S>3427</S> of Saphir<S>8208</S>, having thy shame<S>1322</S> naked<S>6181</S>: the inhabitant<S>3427</S> of Zaanan<S>6630</S> came not forth<S>3318</S> in the mourning<S>4553</S> of Bethezel<S>1018</S>; he shall receive<S>3947</S> of you his standing<S>5979</S>. <sup>thou: or, thou that dwellest fairly</sup> <sup>inhabitant: Heb. inhabitress</sup> <sup>Zaanan: or, The country of flocks</sup> <sup>Bethezel: or, A place near</sup>
For the inhabitant<S>3427</S> of Maroth<S>4796</S> waited carefully<S>2342</S> for good<S>2896</S>: but evil<S>7451</S> came down<S>3381</S> from the LORD<S>3068</S> unto the gate<S>8179</S> of Jerusalem<S>3389</S>. <sup>inhabitant: Heb. inhabitress</sup> <sup>waited: or, was grieved</sup>
O thou inhabitant<S>3427</S> of Lachish<S>3923</S>, bind<S>7573</S> the chariot<S>4818</S> to the swift beast<S>7409</S>: she is the beginning<S>7225</S> of the sin<S>2403</S> to the daughter<S>1323</S> of Zion<S>6726</S>: for the transgressions<S>6588</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> were found<S>4672</S> in thee. <sup>inhabitant: Heb. inhabitress</sup>
Therefore shalt thou give<S>5414</S> presents<S>7964</S> to Moreshethgath<S>4182</S>: the houses<S>1004</S> of Achzib<S>392</S> shall be a lie<S>391</S> to the kings<S>4428</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>. <sup>to: or, for Moreshethgath</sup> <sup>Achzib: that is, A lie</sup>
Yet will I bring<S>935</S> an heir<S>3423</S> unto thee, O inhabitant<S>3427</S> of Mareshah<S>4762</S>: he shall come<S>935</S> unto Adullam<S>5725</S> the glory<S>3519</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>. <sup>inhabitant: Heb. inhabitress</sup> <sup>he: or, the glory of Israel shall, etc</sup>
Make thee bald<S>7139</S>, and poll<S>1494</S> thee for thy delicate<S>8588</S> children<S>1121</S>; enlarge<S>7337</S> thy baldness<S>7144</S> as the eagle<S>5404</S>; for they are gone into captivity<S>1540</S> from thee.
